message: Let's get this started! I'll take 90% and you get 10%. What do you say?
Let's meet in the middle! 50/50 split, no hard feelings
You wanted to meet in the middle? I'll give you a bit less, but I'll still take the lead. 70% for me, 30% for you. Take it or leave it!
You're not getting 70%! I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still not giving up. 60/40 split, let's see if you'll take it
You're not getting 60%? Fine, I'll give you 40% and take the rest. It's a fair deal, considering the inflation. Take it or leave it!
You're not willing to give me more? I'll give you a bit less, but I'm still hoping to get a better deal. 65/35 split, let's see if you'll take it
You're not getting 65%? Fine, I'll give you a bit more. 45% for me, 55% for you. It's a decent deal, considering the inflation. Take it or leave it!
